meaningMnemonic: Remember how you learned that 感慨 means "strong feelings?" Well feelings so strong that you can <kanji>not</kanji> even think of a <kanji>quantity</kanji> to measure or explain how much you feel. These are really <vocabulary>deep emotion</vocabulary>s. They fill you all the way up and you can't help but tell everyone about them.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
